Qieyun: 澄開三之去?, 常開三蒸入?
見一東入?, 來一東入?, 以三鍾入?
影開三A眞平?, 影開四先平?
English: to sink in water; to soak
to press down; to crush; to repress

Qieyun: 生開二麻平?, 生開二麻去?
泥開四齊平?, 泥開四齊去?
羣合三文入?, 羣合三元入?

English: the moving power. a machine. chance; opportunity.
to rely upon; to trust to.
the ore of metals; a mine.

Qieyun: 曉開三蒸平?, 曉開三蒸去?
English: to rise; to raise; to develop; to prosper.
to open. to explain; to state. to begin.
to pick; to gather; to choose.
to wait for; to await; to treat.
a spring of water; a source.
a mound of earth; a tumulus.

Qieyun: 端合一寒上?, 定合一寒上?, 端合一寒去?
English: to cut off; to severe; to decide; certainly.
to monopolize. a mound of vantage from which in ancient times certain dealer tried to get the better of his fellow-traders in the market place
